src:
Mimpi Wishnutama: Pariwisata Penghasil Devisa Nomor Satu
05 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama dan Angela Tanoe (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Menjadi Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf), Wishnutama punya cita-cita. Dia ingin menjadikan pariwisata sebagai penghasil devisa nomor satu."Mimpi kami, pariwisata menjadi penghasil devisa nomor satu di negeri ini, apalagi melibatkan investasi di bidang kreatif juga," ujar Wishnutama dalam acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019).BACA JUGA: Wishnutama: Menteri-menteri Sangat Cair dan MenyenangkanApalagi, kini pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif digabung dalam satu badan. Menurut Wishnutama, hal itu merupakan momentum yang harus diperhitungkan."Ini momentum kita untuk meningkatkan kualitas produk ekonomi dan kreatif Indonesia yang menjadi terbaik di Asia Tenggara, bahkan di dunia," terangnya.Wishnutama menjelaskan, pariwisata harus dibangun secara sustainable alias berkelanjutan. Artinya, pariwisata dibangun dengan cara menjaga dan melestarikan alam."Kekayaan alam yang indah itu adalah pemberian Tuhan, tapi kemampuan kitalah untuk mengelolanya sekuat tenaga dan membuat daya tarik dan seterusnya hingga berdampak luar biasa," paparnya."Pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif adalah potensi yang luar biasa untuk mendapatkan banyak devisa di masa depan. Sekarang masih nomor dua, tapi nanti semoga jadi yang pertama," tutup Wishnutama.BACA JUGA: Presiden Jokowi: Pariwisata Bisa Jadi Devisa Terbesar Simak Video "Tak Hadiri Wisuda Putrinya karena Pelantikan, Wishnutama Minta Maaf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)
FOKUS BERITA

Duet Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe
text:
Wishnutama's Dream: Number One Foreign Exchange-Producing Tourism
05 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama and Angela Tanoe (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta Duet - Becoming Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf), Wishnutama has aspirations. He wants to make tourism as the number one foreign exchange earner. "Our dream, tourism is the number one foreign exchange earner in this country, especially if it involves investment in the creative field as well," Wishnutama said at the Ngopi Together Mas Tama and Mbak Angela events held by the Ministry of Tourism and Economics Creative at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). READ ALSO: Wishnutama: Ministers are Very Liquid and Fun Moreover, now tourism and the creative economy are combined in one body. According to Wishnutama, this is a momentum that must be taken into account. "This is our momentum to improve the quality of Indonesia's economic and creative products that are the best in Southeast Asia, even in the world," he explained. Wishnutama explained, tourism must be built in a sustainable or sustainable way. That is, tourism is built by way of preserving and preserving nature. "Beautiful natural wealth is a gift from God, but it is our ability to manage it with all your might and make the attraction and so on until it has an extraordinary impact," he explained. "Tourism and creative economy is a potential extraordinary to get a lot of foreign exchange in the future. Now it's still number two, but later hopefully be the first, "close Wishnutama. READ ALSO: President Jokowi: Tourism Could Be the Largest Foreign Exchange Watch Video" Didn't Attend Her Daughter's Graduation for Inauguration, Wishnutama Apologize "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (aff / aff)
NEWS FOCUS

Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet
